issues.title: Ambiguous parameter name lacks timezone clarity
issues.description: Parameter 'created_since' doesn't clarify timezone handling requirements. Could lead to off-by-hours bugs.
issues.recommendation: Rename to 'created_since_utc' and add validation for timezone-aware timestamps

issues.title: Magic number 50 without named constant
issues.description: Hardcoded limit of 50 stories makes future changes difficult and intent unclear
issues.recommendation: Extract to named constant NEW_STORIES_DISPLAY_LIMIT with explanation

issues.title: Function name doesn't convey filtering behavior
issues.description: Name 'fetchNewStories' is too generic; doesn't indicate timestamp-based filtering

issues.title: Missing docstring for complex state interaction
issues.description: Auto-selection logic interacts with 3 state variables but lacks explanation of business logic
issues.recommendation: Add detailed comment explaining why only completed runs, why check !selectedRunId, and error handling
